aboutMarito.intro: Rito 'Mafoko' ri huma eka Xitsonga, ri vula 'marito' kumbe 'mavito'. Lexi i xikumiwa xa webu lexi ya emahlweni lexi hlanganisaka ndhawu ya le xikarhi ka ndhavuko wa ririmi wa Afrika Dzonga na ku fikelela ka xidijitali xa sweswi. Vatiwa va tindzimi, valavi va NLP, na vutivi bya tindzimi va nga tirhisa Marito tanihi pulatifomo yo hlanganisiwa ku lavisisa, ku hoxa matshalatshala, na ku hlayisa swinyorwa swa marito ya tindzimi to hambana, mabuku ya marito, na mabenge ya marito eka tindzimi ta 11 ta ximfumo ta Afrika Dzonga.
aboutMarito.mission: Mafoko yi tirha kahle hinkwako eka inthanete na handle ka inthanete, yi nyika matimba vaaki ku fikelela switirhisiwa swa tindzimi swo fela, ku nyika mavonelo, na ku tirhisana ku aka ma-lexicons yo tiya eka tindzimi leti nga na switirhisiwa swintsongo. Pulatifomo leyi i xiphemu xa ntirho lowu ya emahlweni lowu endliwaka hi DSFSI (Data Science for Social Impact) eka Yunivesiti ya Pretoria ku endla leswaku switirhisiwa swa tindzimi swi fikeleleka vaaki hinkwavo na ku susa emahlweni dylondzo ya ku tirhisa ririmi ra ntumbuluko eka tindzimi ta Afrika.
aboutMarito.teamCredit: Yi akiwe hi ku tinyungubyisa hi Velox

aboutMofoko.title: NgeMafoko
aboutMofoko.content: IMafoko (lechaza “emavi” ngesiTswana) liyipulatifomu yemilomo leminingi leyakhelwe kutsi ibungate kanye nekuxhumanisa tilwimi letingu-11 letisemthethweni taseNingizimu Afrika.

whyMafoko.title: Kungani iMafoko ikhona
whyMafoko.content: Tilwimi taseNingizimu Afrika tiyaphila, tiyavezwa, futsi tihlobene kakhulu nebuntfu bethu, kodvwa letinyenti takhona asikavakali kahle emhlabeni wedijithali. IMafoko yakhiwe kutawushintja loko. Ihlanganisa emavi netincazelo letivela kumagrosa lamanyenti ibe yindawo leyodwa lengaseshwa kalula, lokwenza kube lula kakhulu kuhlola emavi, kucondza tinhlamuselo, futsi kufundza ngato tonkhe tilwimi letingu-11 letisemthethweni.
whyMafoko.content2: Noma ngabe uxhumekile ku-inthanethi noma awuxhumekanga, iMafoko igcina lwati lwemilomo lusedvute. Iphindze ikhutsate kubambisana, ivumele imiphakatsi kutsi inikete tincomo, yabelane ngelwati, futsi isite ekuphuculeni likhwalithi yeluhlobo ngalunye lweligrosa ngesikhatsi lesidze.
whyMafoko.content3: Ngokuvuselela tinsita telulwimi letatihlukene wente ipulatifomu leyodwa lephilako nalekhula njalo, iMafoko isita ekugcineni lifa lethu futsi isekela imfundvo lehlanganako kanye necwaningo lelisekela tilwimi letine tinsita letincane.

whoMafoko.title: Labayakhelwe yona
whoMafoko.content: Bafundzi, titfunywa tetemfundvo, bacwaningi, kanye nanoma ngubani lonetintfo ngelulwimi nesiko.

howMafoko.title: Indlela yekusebenzisa iMafoko
howMafoko.content: Ungasebentisa iMafoko kutfola emavi, kuhlola tindzawo letihlukene telulwimi, kubuka tinhlamuselo, futsi wabelane ngemibono yakho kusita ekuphuculeni ipulatifomu.
howMafoko.help: Kutfola incazelo lenemininingwane lehlanganisa timhlahlandlela letimfisha kanye nemavidiyo ekuchazeni, sicela uvakashele

behindProject.title: Ngemuva kwePhrojekthi
behindProject.content: IMafoko yakhiwe yelihlangano leData Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) eNyuvesi yasePitoli.

termsAndConditions.title: Imigomo Nemibandzela
termsAndConditions.welcome: Siyakwamukela eMafoko, lipulatifomu lemilomo leliningi lelakhiwe futhi lephatselwe lihlangano leData Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) eNyuvesi yasePitoli. Ngokusebenzisa iMafoko, uyavuma nale Migomo Nemibandzela. Sicela uyifundze kahle ungakafinyeleli noma ungakatfaki kuhlelo lolu.
termsAndConditions.purpose: IMafoko (lecishe kutsi lichaze ‘emavi’ ngesiTswana) liyipulatifomu yefundvo lengasiyo yekuhweba lekhutsata tilwimi letingu-11 letisemthethweni taseNingizimu Afrika ngokunikeza lithuba lekufinyelela emagama lamanyenti nemitfombo yemitfombolwimi. Lipulatifomu leli lakhelwe kutsi lisekele imfundvo lebambisanako, locwaningo kanye nekubambisana phakathi kwemiphakatsi yetilwimi.
termsAndConditions.user: Kutsi usebente kuMafoko, njengakulayisha emagama, kuvota, kuphawula noma kufaka sicelo sekuba ngumfundzisi welulwimi, umsebenti kufanele adale i-akhawunti. Uyavuma kuniketa lwati lolunembile naluthembekile uma ubhalisa, bese ugcina imininingwane yakho yokungena iyimfihlo. I-DSFSI inelilungelo lekumisa noma kususa ema-akhawunti lakhinyabetse imigomo noma lafaka lokungafanele.
termsAndConditions.contribution: IMafoko ivumela basebenti kutsi balayishe emagama, tinhlamuselo, tincazelo kanye nemazwi. Ngokuniketa loku, unika i-DSFSI ilayisensi lengasiyo yekukhokha, lengesiyo yebunikazi yekukhombisa, kukopisha kabusha, nekusabalalisa tinikelo takho ngaphakathi kuMafoko ngenhloso yefundvo nocwaningo.
termsAndConditions.contribution2: Tonkhupha tonkhe kufanele tibe letifanele, letihloniphekile, naletifaneleke ngekulwimi. Lokuhlambalazako, lokungafanele noma lokuyimanga kutosuswa, futsi kutibona lokungaphindze kungaholela ekuvinjelweni kwe-akhawunti.
termsAndConditions.linguist: Basebenti labafuna kuba nguchwepheshe wetilwimi kulelipulatifomu bangafaka ticelo ngalokunikeza bufakazi bemaphepha abo esayensi (njengemarekhodi e-Google Scholar). I-DSFSI inelilungelo lekubuka nekucinisekisa imibhalo ngaphambi kwekunika licensi leliphezulu.
termsAndConditions.property: Liphulatifomu leMafoko, lelifaka umklamo walona, sakhiwo salo, kanye nemagama lawakhelwe, liyipropathi yengcondvo ye-DSFSI kanye neNyuvesi yasePitoli. Emagama netinguqulo ngalinye kusala kuyipropathi yabanikeli bawo, kodvwa kungaphindze kusetjentiswe ngaphakathi kuMafoko ngenhloso yefundvo necwaningo njengoba kuchaziwe ngenhla.
termsAndConditions.accuracy: Nakuba iMafoko ifuna kuniketa lwati lolunembile noluthembekile lwetilwimi, i-DSFSI ayinakuqinisekisa kuphumelela noma kunemba kwemitfombo. Liphulatifomu liniketiwe 'njengoba linjalo' ngenhloso yefundvo, futsi i-DSFSI ayinacala kunoma yikuphi kukhubeka, kushiywa noma imiphumela lephuma ekusebentisweni kwalo.
termsAndConditions.commercial: IMafoko iniketiwe mahhala ngenhloso yefundvo necwaningo. Akukho lokusemaphulatifomu lokungakopishwa, kusatjalaliswe noma kusetjentiswe ngekutsengisa ngaphandle kwemvume lebhaliwe evela ku-DSFSI.
termsAndConditions.privacy: IMafoko ayisebentisi emakhukhi, kutfutfukisa tilandeleko, noma tinsita tekukhangisa. Lwati lwe-akhawunti lugcinwa kuphela kucinisekisa kubamba kwabasebenti kanye nekugcina kushushiswa kahle kwepulatifomu. I-DSFSI ayabelani ngelwati lwemuntfu nemalunga langaphandle.
termsAndConditions.change: I-DSFSI ingahle ivuselele le Migomo Nemibandzela ngesikhatsi lesitsite kusikhombisa kutfutfuka noma kuchubeka kwenqubomgomo. Kusebentisa iMafoko ngemva kwekuchubekela phambili kusho kutsi uyemukela imigomo leyishintjiwe.
termsAndConditions.contact: Ngekunye nemibuto noma kunetseka mayelana nale Migomo Nemibandzela, sicela uxhumane neData Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) eNyuvesi yasePitoli.

glossaryPage2.agriculture: Emagama lahambelana netemo, kufuywa kwemfuyo, kanye netinqubo tekukhiqiza tekulima.
glossaryPage2.construction: Emagama asetjentiswa ekwakheni, tintfo tekwakha, kanye nekuphatsa umsebenti.
glossaryPage2.demography: Emagama abalulekile lachaza kubunjwa kwesive kanye netibalo temphakatsi.
glossaryPage2.education: Emagama lahambelana nemfundvo, kufundzisa kanye netinhlelo temfundvo.
glossaryPage2.energy: Imicondvo lehlobene nekukhiqizwa kwemandla kanye netinhlelo tamandla.
glossaryPage2.environment: Emagama lachaza kuvikelwa kwemvelo, ekoloji kanye nekusimama kwemvelo.
glossaryPage2.generalDemography: Tibalo temphakatsi letihlanganisa iminyaka, bulili kanye nekufuduka kwabantu.
glossaryPage2.businessEnterprises: Imicondvo lehlobene nekuphatsa emagumbi ebhizinisi, kusungula kanye nemsebenti wekhamphani.
glossaryPage2.geography: Emagama lahambelana netindawo, emaphrovinsi kanye nekudweba emamephu.
glossaryPage2.healthVitalStats: Tincazelo nemagama lahambelana netempilo, inhlalakahle kanye netibalo letibalulekile.
glossaryPage2.householdIncome: Imicondvo lehlobene netimali yasemakhaya, tindleko kanye netinga tekuphila.
glossaryPage2.housingServices: Emagama lachaza tindlu, ingqalasimiso kanye netinsita temadolobha letibalulekile.
glossaryPage2.incomeWealth: Emagama emnotfo lachaza kusatjalaliswa kwemholo, timali temhlalaphansi kanye nemcebo wemakhaya.
glossaryPage2.industryTrade: Emagama lahambelana nemakhamphani, kutsengisa kanye nekukhiqiza embonini.
glossaryPage2.labour: Emagama ahlobene nemsebenti kufaka sikhatsi setisebenti, imiholo kanye nemakethe yemsebenti.
glossaryPage2.lawJustice: Emagama lachaza timo temtsetfo, emalungelo kanye nekuphatsa kwekwehlulela.
glossaryPage2.manufacturing: Imicondvo lehlobene nekukhiqiza kwemboni, tinqubo tekukhiqiza kanye netichungechunge tekuphasisa.
glossaryPage2.nationalAccounts: Tikhombandlela temnotfo letibalulekile letihlanganisa GDP, imali yelive kanye netibalo temali.
glossaryPage2.government: Emagama lachaza sakhono selihulumende, kubusa kanye netinhlelo temphakatsi.
glossaryPage2.populationCensus: Emagama lahambelana nekubalwa kwemphakatsi kanye nekucwaninga ngemphakatsi.
glossaryPage2.poverty: Imicondvo kanye netindlela tekukala kubhaca, kungalingani kanye nekutfutfukisa umphakatsi.
glossaryPage2.prices: Emagama emnotfo lachaza intengo, intengo yabathengi kanye nekwenta kwemali.
glossaryPage2.privateSector: Emagama lachaza umsebenti wemabhizinisi angaphandle kwembuso, kutfutfukisa kanye netimali letitfutfukisako.
glossaryPage2.publicFinance: Emagama lachaza tekanyetso yemali yembuso, intela kanye nekuphatsa kwezimali temphakatsi.
glossaryPage2.scienceTech: Imicondvo yesayensi kanye neteknoloji lehlanganisa lucwaningo kanye nekuvelela lobusha.
glossaryPage2.socialConditions: Emagama lachaza inhlalakahle yemphakatsi, tinsita temphakatsi kanye netimo tekuphila.
glossaryPage2.statisticalProcesses: Emagama ebuchwepheshe lachaza amazinga etibalo, metadata kanye netindlela tedatha.
glossaryPage2.businessRegisters: Imicondvo lehlobene nekugcina nekubuyeketa tibhuku temabhizinisi tembuso.
glossaryPage2.tourism: Emagama lahambelana nekuvakasha, imboni yekungcebeleka kanye netibalo tebavakashi.
glossaryPage2.tourismMigration: Emagama lachaza kuhamba kwemvakashi, tinhlobo tekufuduka kanye nekufuduka kwabantu.
glossaryPage2.trade: Imicondvo lehlanganisa kuhlanganyela ekutengi, kutsengisa kanye nekushintshana kwelive nelive.
glossaryPage2.transportCommunication: Emagama lachaza tindlela tekuthutha, ingqalasimiso kanye netinhlelo tekukhulumisana.
glossaryPage2.connectionError: Kubeka luphawu kudzinga kube nekunamatselana ku-inthanethi.
glossaryPage2.loginError: Sicela ungene ngemvume ukuze ubeke luphawu kumadikhishinari.

termHelpPage.title: Kwekucondzisa Incwadzi Yemagama
termHelpPage.intro: I-Incwadzi Yemagama yindawo lapho ungaphenya khona tincazelo temagama ngemilomo leminyenti kulimi lolungemashumi lanyenti nanye lolusemtsetfweni eNingizimu Afrika. Ivumela kuphenya ngekushesha, kukhetsa ngelulwimi noma ngendzawo, kanye nekusebenta ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi uma incwadzi yemagama seyilandiwe ngaphambili.
termHelpPage.overviewBody: Incwadzi yemagama ivumela umsebenti wekufuna tincazelo temagama ngemilomo leminyenti kululwimi lolusemtsetfweni eNingizimu Afrika.
termHelpPage.whatIsATermBody: Lisho ngalinye eMarito lihlanganisa lemininingwane lelandzelako:

termFields.language: Lulwimi: Lolunye lwekulimi lolungemashumi lanyenti nanye lolusemtsetfweni eNingizimu Afrika.
termFields.related: Tisho Letihlobene: Tixhumanisi netisho letinekwahlobana noma letihlobene nencenye.

termHelpPage.languagesBody: Marito isekela tonkhe tilwimi letilishumi nanye letisemthethweni eNingizimu Afrika. Ungasebentisa kukhetsa kuhlunga ngekulwimi linye noma uphenye tonkhe tilwimi.
termHelpPage.searchBody1: Umsebenti wekuphenya eMarito usita kufuna tisho ngemalulwimi onkhe lalishumi nanye lolusemtsetfweni eNingizimu Afrika.
termHelpPage.searchBody2: Ngesikhatsi ubhala, Marito iyaphenya ngalesikhatsi, ibuyisele imiphumela ngesikhathi sangempela.

searchFields.term: Lisho: Ligama noma lihumusho lelimelela umqondo lothile.
searchFields.definition: Inchazelo: Tisho letineinchazelo letihlanganisa emagama lofunako nato titawe kubonakala.

termHelpPage.searchLiveBody: Marito ingaphakamisa tisho letihlobene noma tiphakamiso ngesikhatsi ubhala.
termHelpPage.searchSensitivityBody: Ngokuvamile, Marito iyaphenya ngendlela lenembile noma lecishe inembile, kodvwa ungase uvumele kuphenya lokungemakhaza (fuzzy search).
termHelpPage.searchResultBody: Tisho tiboniswa emakhadini lakhombisa ligama, lulwimi, indzawo, inchazelo, kanye netinhlavu tekukhetsa.
termHelpPage.filtersBody: Kunciphisa imiphumela, sebenzisa tihluzi letisemkhatsini wekhasi lekuphenya.

filtersList.language: Lulwimi: Nciphisa imiphumela kululwimi lunye kuphela.
filtersList.domain: Indzawo: Gxila emitfombeni lefanako njengeMfundo, Lendzawo yeTheknoloji noma Tembilo.
filtersList.fuzzy: Kuphenya Lokungemakhaza: Tfuna tisho noma kukhona tiphoso tekupela noma kwehlukana.

termHelpPage.viewBody: Cindzetela inkinobho ye-'Buka' ekhadi lelisho kuvula inchazelo lenkhulu bese uphenya tisho letihlobene.
termHelpPage.offlineBody: Marito ingasetjentiswa ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi uma incwadzi yemagama seyilandiwe ngaphambili.
termHelpPage.offlineEnd: Ngemva kwekulandza, tisho letikuleso sicelo temagama titawuhlala tikhona ngisho nawungaxhunyiwe kwi-inthanethi.

workspaceHelpPage.title: Go tlhaloganya Workspace
workspaceHelpPage.intro: Workspace e go letla go boloka mafoko le diglosari tse o nang le kgatlhego mo go tsone, go di rulaganya mo ditlhopheng, le go laola ditlhopha tseo. Ke kwa o ka salang morago ka teng kgatelopele ya ditlhahiso tsa gago tsa mafoko le go boloka dikwalo tsa gago tsa tiro.
workspaceHelpPage.groupsBody: Ditlhopha di thusa go rulaganya mafoko a a bolokilweng. O ka dira ditlhopha tse disha, wa di reetsa maina a mangwe, kgotsa wa phimola tse o sa di tlhokeng.
groupsSteps: Dira Setlhopha: Tobetsa konopo ya Setlhopha se Sesha, tsenya leina, tlhopha mafoko, mme o netefatse ka go tobetsa Oketsa Mafoko.
Tlotla Setlhopha: Tobetsa letshwao la pentšele fa thoko ga leina la setlhopha, fetola leina, mme o netefatse ka go tobetsa Fetola Leina.
Phimola Setlhopha: Tobetsa letshwao la go phimola, tlhopha ditlhopha tse o batlang go di tima, mme o netefatse.
workspaceHelpPage.moveTitle: Go Fetisetsa Mafoko Gare ga Ditlhopha
workspaceHelpPage.moveBody: Go fetisetsa lefoko go setlhopha se sengwe, tobetsa letshwao la go fetisetsa fa thoko ga lefoko mme o tlhophe setlhopha se sesha.
workspaceHelpPage.notesBody: Dikwalo di go letla go oketsa bokao mo mafokong a a bolokilweng. O ka dira, fetola, kgotsa phimola dikwalo mo Workspace.
notesSteps: Oketsa Lokwalo: Tobetsa letshwao la lokwalo fa thoko ga lefoko, kwala lokwalo, mme o tobetsa Boloka.
Fetola Lokwalo: Tobetsa letshwao la pentšele, fetola mafoko, mme o tobetsa Boloka.
Phimola Lokwalo: Dirisa kgetho ya go phimola go tima dikwalo tse di sa tlhokegang.
workspaceHelpPage.deleteBody: O ka tima dilo mo Workspace nako nngwe le nngwe:
deleteSteps: Phimola Lefoko: Eya mo Mafokong a a Bolokilweng, tobetsa letshwao la go phimola, mme o netefatse.
Phimola Glosari: Eya mo Diglosaring tse di Bolokilweng, tobetsa kgetho ya go tima, mme o netefatse.

settingsHelpPage.title: Dipehelo le Boikamahanyo
settingsHelpPage.intro: Sebelisa leqephe la Dipehelo ho fetola dikgetho tsa hao — ho kenyeletsa sehlooho, dintlha tsa profaele, le phihlello — ho etsa boiphihlelo bo botle ka ho fetisisa bakeng sa hao.
settingsHelpPage.modesTitle: Ho Fetola Pakeng tsa Mokhoa o Khanyang le o Monyenyane
settingsHelpPage.modesBody: Mafoko e o dumella ho fetola kapele pakeng tsa mokhoa o khanyang le mokhoa o lefifi ho latela seo o se ratang le tikoloho ya hao. Tshebetso ena e fumaneha maqephe ohle mme e ntlafatsa sebopeho hang-hang ntle le ho sitisa mosebetsi wa hao.
modesSteps: Fumana Konopo: Batla letshwao la letsatsi/khoeli hukung e ka tlase le letsohong le letshoto.
Fetola Mokhoa: Tobetsa letshwao ho fetola hang-hang pakeng tsa Mokhoa o Khanyang le o Lefifi.
settingsHelpPage.profileBody: O ka ntlafatsa lebitso, imeile, kapa phasewete neng kapa neng ho tloha diphehong tsa profaele ya hao. Phetoho e nngwe le e nngwe e hloka netefatso bakeng sa tshireletso.
profileSteps: Ntlafatsa Lebitso: Tobetsa Fetola Lebitso, kenya lebitso le letjha, netefatsa ka phasewete ya hao, mme o tobetse Boloka.
Ntlafatsa Imeile: Tobetsa Fetola Imeile, kenya aterese e ntjha, netefatsa ka phasewete, mme o tobetse Boloka.
Ntlafatsa Phasewete: Tobetsa Fetola Phasewete, kenya phasewete e ntjha, netefatsa, mme o tobetse Boloka.
settingsHelpPage.accessibilityBody: Mafoko e fana ka dikgetho tse fapaneng tsa phihlello hore o ka ikamahanya le lenaneo ho latela ditlhoko tsa hao. O ka fetola puo, boholo ba mongolo, sebaka, le phapang ya mebala ka ho toba ho menu ya dipehelo.
accessibilitySteps: Fetola Puo ya Lenaneo: Bula lenane la ho theoha mme o kgethe puo eo o e ratang.
Bulela Mokgwa wa Phapang e Phahameng: Tobetsa High Contrast toggle ho fetola mokgwa wa mebala e pharalletseng.

leaningPathHelp.title: Kwatiwa Kwemgudu WeMfundo
leaningPathHelp.section1: Lusito lwe-Learning Path lukuvumela kutsi wakhe umgudu lowuhlelwe kahle wekufundza lulwimi lolusemthethweni lwaseNingizimu Afrika. Ngokukhetsa lulwimi naletinsita lofuna kutifundza, ungacondza indlela lehlukanisiwe kunekuhlola ngendlela lengahlelekile.
leaningPathHelp.section2: Umugudu ngulowo nalowo wemfundvo uhlangene nemagama, tisebenti tekucinisekisa, kanye nekulandzela inqubekela phambili kutsi uhlale ukhutsatekile futsi ulinganise kahle.
leaningPathHelp.section3: Siphiko sakho sekubuka asisekeli lelabeli levidiyo.
leaningPathHelp.section4: Ngemva kwekutsi ukhetse lulwimi, utawucelwa kutsi ukhetse i-glossary. I-glossary ngayinye ihlelwe ngedomeyini (Imfundvo, Timpilo, Theknoloji) kutsi ugxile emagameni abaluleke kakhulu kuwe.
leaningPathHelp.section5: Uma i-glossary yakho isisethiwe, ungakhetsa indlela lofuna kufundza ngayo
leaningPathHelp.section7: Phendvula imibuto kutsi uhlolisise lwati lwakho futsi uqinisekise lokufundzile.
leaningPathHelp.section9: Sebentisa emakhadi kufundza nekukhumbula emagama ngesivinini sakho.
leaningPathHelp.section12: Learning Path ilandzela umsebenti wakho kutsi ubone kutsi sewuhambe kangakanani. Inqubekela phambili iboniswa kanye nemaphesenti emphakatsi wakho, kwenta kube lula kutsi uhlale ukhutsatekile.
leaningPathHelp.section13: Hlanganisa emgudu wemfundvo netinselelo temaviki kanye netincomo kutsi utfole tibheji ngenkathi uthuthukisa lwati lwakho lwemilomo.

helpPage2.section2: Tataiso ya mohato ka mohato ya go hlama akhaonto, go tsena, le go sepela ka setšhaba lekgetlo la mathomo.
helpPage2.section3Desc: Ithute ka go romela, go tlogela ditlhaloso, le go šoma mmogo le ba bangwe o šomiša didiriswa tša setšhaba tša bjalo ka go fa ditlhopho le dipoledišano.
helpPage2.dictionaryDesc: Nyaka mantšu ka dipuo tše di fapanego, bulela patlo e e sa nepahalago, gomme o fetole dipeakanyo tša pukuntšu ya gago.
helpPage2.glossaryDesc: Rulaganya, hlopha, le go romela di-glossary ka sehlopha, lefapha, goba polokelo ya phetolelo.
helpPage2.workspaceDesc: Boloka le go laola mantšu le di-glossary tša gago, latela dikgopelo, gomme o šome mmogo o šomiša dingwalo le dihlopha.
helpPage2.settingsDesc: Fetola dikgetho tša bjalo ka mokgwa wa lesedi/kapa wa lefifi, dikgetho tša phihlelelo, dintlha tša profaele, le dipeakanyo tše dingwe tša modirisi.
helpPage2.homeDesc: Hlahloba mmepe wa Afrika Borwa o šomago, hwetša mantšu a a sa tlwaelegago, gomme o bone kakaretšo ya dikateng tše di kgethegilego.
helpPage2.dashboardDesc: Latela mešomo ya sethala ka digarafi, lebelela data, gomme o hlahlobe meneelo ya gago lefelong le tee.
helpPage2.learningPathDesc: Aga leeto le le rulagantšwego la go ithuta e nngwe ya dipuo tša semmušo tša Afrika Borwa.
helpPage2.feedbackDesc: Romela ditlhahiso, thoriso, goba ditletlebo go sehlopha go thuša go kaonafatša sethala.
helpPage2.faqsDesc: Dikarabo tša dipotšišo tše di tlwaelegilego ka ga sethala.
